Name: Hoppa
About the game: Hoppa is a short adventure game about a baby duck that is separated from its mother, could you bring them back? Features ~5 minutes of gameplay, it's quite short. A cool jumping mechanic. Relaxing audio. Cute ducks. Funny leg animations. Almost more achievements than minutes of playtime! Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks! Subscribe for 3$ per month at
